about_the_game:
Till All Complete

You have fallen. Your soul is a cat, journeying to the center of The Afterlife in order to save your human. However, the Reapers will try to stop you from reaching The Tower. An ancient being (helps?) defeat Death itself in this narrative RPG with turn-based boss battles.

Game Features:

  • NO quest markers - interact with residents of The Afterlife to progress.
  • Actually, there are no menus at all - game systems are directly integrated into the world.
  • Heartfelt story with deep characters that respond to actions you've taken.
  • I am sorry for what I do to these characters.
  • The best part of RPG's is exploring RPG towns so I put a lot of that.
  • Help lost souls become complete in cozy quests.
  • There is a button to sleep at any moment.
  • Fully original soundtrack composed with a story-first design.
  • NO random battles - only fight bosses (turn-based).
  • I just put battles 'cause they are cool - it's mostly a narrative game.
  • Decorate your cat with awesome RPG gear (which also levels you up).
  • Created by one developer and a small artist team.
  • This is a happy cute cat game I promise.

name: Not Only Nine PROLOGUE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 Aspect Ratio recommended

short_description: A cat soul journeys through The Afterlife to save their human. An ancient being (helps?) defeat the Reapers in this narrative RPG adventure.
